description: Manage the always-ready settings in the scale configuration.

commands.name: az functionapp scale config always-ready delete
commands.summary: Delete always-ready settings in the scale configuration.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp scale config always-ready delete --setting-names
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--name]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--subscription]
examples: az functionapp scale config always-ready delete --name MyFunctionApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --setting-names key1 key2

commands.name: az functionapp scale config always-ready set
commands.summary: Add or update existing always-ready settings in the scale configuration.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp scale config always-ready set --settings
                                             [--ids]
                                             [--name]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--subscription]
examples: az functionapp scale config always-ready set --name MyFunctionApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --settings key1=value1 key2=value2
